title: New: Wonder Wonder – Body Gold
body:
‘Anonymous’ outfit, of course.

Anyway, it’s easy to see why **Wonder Wonder** have been doing the rounds; their debut track, Body Gold is slick, perfectly produced and with more than enough intrigue and quality to have people buzzing. So with a little bit of knowledge and digging, it’s pretty straight forward (as so often is) to work out who is behind Wonder Wonder, but hey, isn’t that part of the fun? Check out _Body Gold_ below, and check back next month to see if they keep to their promise to release one song every four weeks.
